channel.title: Collect and organize ideas
channel.description:
I'm happy to share the startup I'm working on with the bootstrapped community.
https://walling.app/ basically gives you visual Walls (boards) to collect and plot out ideas for your next project or research and be able to tag those ideas to easily access them again in the future when needed for another new project. The ideas can be text, lists, images, bookmarks..etc
I would love to hear your feedback and if you're interested in subscribing to Walling, please feel free to message me here or on twitter @ahmedelmasry and I will send you a discount coupon code :)

item.title: Collect and organize ideas

item.description:
Thanks Ramin for your feedback! I will try to post more often here, I love the community!

item.description:
Nice job! Looks like you have done a great job making the tool.
If it’s a new business then I suggest posting your progress here too. Some others do.
